/opt/poky/1.5.1/sysroots/x86_64-pokysdk-linux/usr/bin/arm-poky-linux-gnueabi/arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-g++     -Wall -pthread -ffunction-sections  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -fomit-frame-pointer -DNDEBUG          CMakeFiles/opencv_haartraining.dir/haartraining.o  -o ../../bin/opencv_haartraining -rdynamic ../../lib/libopencv_core.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_haartraining_engine.a ../../lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_features2d.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_flann.so.2.3.1 ../../lib/libopencv_core.so.2.3.1 ../../3rdparty/lib/libzlib.a -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/opencv2.3/OpenCV-2.3.1/release/lib:
